title: Harlequin Desire April 2014 releases (Epub)
description:
Harlequin Desire April 2014 releases (Epub)


You can't help itÃ¢â‚¬â€œyou're attracted to power! Harlequin Desire stories feature heroes who have it all: wealth, status, incredible good looksÃ¢â‚¬Â¦everything but the right woman. Add some secrets, maybe a scandal, and start turning pages!


Andrea Laurence - His Lover's Little Secret 

She's kept her baby secret for two yearsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ 

But even after a chance run-in forces her to confront the father of her son, Sabine Hayes refuses to give in to all of Gavin Brooks's demands. His power and his wealth won't turn her head this time. She'll let him get to know Jared, but she won't go back to Gavin's privileged worldÃ¢â‚¬Â¦or his bed. 

Yet Gavin never stopped wanting the woman who challenged him at every turn. He has a right to claim what's hisÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and he'll do just about anything to prevent her from getting away from him again.


Catherine Mann - One Good Cowboy 

From Ex to Eternity? 

To inherit his family's empire, Texas cowboy-turned-CEO Stone McNair must prove he has a heart beneath his ruthlessly suave exterior. His trial? Finding homes for his grandmother's rescue dogs. His judge? Johanna Fletcher, the woman whose heart he broke. 

Sure, Johanna can handle a week traveling the country with her ex-fiancÃƒÂ© to fulfilll his dying grandmother's request. She and Stone want different thingsÃ¢â‚¬â€plain and simple. But there's nothing plain about Stone, or simple about the heat that still flares between them. One week may not be long enoughÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.


Janice Maynard - A Not-So-Innocent Seduction 

Taming the Untamable 

Secrets have never appealed to Liam Kavanagh. Not since his father disappeared, leaving Liam responsible for the Kavanagh family and their empire with little room for anything else. But when the mysterious Zoe Chamberlain breezes into his life, stirring up all kinds of pent-up frustrations, Liam knows there's more to her vagabond lifestyle than she's letting on. He can see the secrets in her eyesÃ¢â‚¬â€and he wants her anyway. Will she be more than his orderly life can handle? Or will Liam's strong embrace finally allow this free spirit to put down roots and love again?



Maureen Child - The Black Sheep's Inheritance 

Follow the moneyÃ¢â‚¬Â¦into bed! 

Estranged from his adoptive father, Sage Lassiter earned his own billions. But when J.D. Lassiter leaves a fortune to his private nurse in his will and cheats his own daughter of her rightful inheritanceÃ¢â‚¬Â¦Sage is enraged, to say the least. He's sure nurse Colleen Falkner isn't the innocent she appears. And he's willing to go to any lengths to expose herÃ¢â‚¬Â¦even seduction. 

But using sexÃ¢â‚¬â€crazed, incredible sexÃ¢â‚¬â€to find out what she knows could backfire. Because Colleen is not what Sage expected. And like it or not, she's about to demolish all the barriers he's carefully constructed around his heart.


Red Garnier - Once Pregnant, Twice Shy 

What's one impulsive night between old friends? 

Tied together by tragedy, business tycoon Garrett Gage has always vowed to protect Kate DevaneyÃ¢â‚¬â€at all costs. What he doesn't expect is that she'd someday need protection from him. When did Kate blossom from an orphaned little girl into a breathtaking woman? And what possessed him to forsake a deathbed vow and take vulnerable Kate into his arms, into his bed? 

Now that they'd been intimate, things have changedÃ¢â‚¬â€more than Garrett could possibly know. Kate is carrying his child. And along with that, a secret that could change everythingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.


Yvonne Lindsay - Wanting What She Can't Have 

Craving the ForbiddenÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ 

Billionaire Raoul Benoit lets Alexis Fabrini, his late wife's best friend, become his daughter's nanny for one reason only: the baby deserves love and attention. Raoul doesn'tÃ¢â‚¬â€he has to pay for his sins, which means steering clear of Alexis no matter how much he wants her. 

The least Alexis can do is help out with this child. But she can't let herself fall into bed with Raoul. She's lived with her unrequited feelings for a long timeÃ¢â‚¬â€what's a little while longer? The problem is, the feelings are more than requited, and can no longer be deniedÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.

Format: EPUB
